text: George Zuverink (August 20, 1924 - September 8, 2014) was an American professional baseball player. He was a right-handed pitcher over parts of eight Major League Baseball seasons (1951-52, 1954-59) with the Cleveland Indians, Cincinnati Redlegs, Detroit Tigers and Baltimore Orioles. He was born in Holland, Michigan. Zuverink died in Tempe, Arizona from complications from pneumonia caused by a fractured hip he suffered from a fall in May 2014.Holland native George Zuverink, ex-MLB pitcher, dies at 90 He was 90 years old. ==Further reading== *. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Deaths from fractured hip Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Cincinnati Reds players Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:People from Holland, Michigan Category:Sportspeople from Michigan
title: George Zuverink
